verbose_text: In conclusion, the present study demonstrated that NMDA receptor activation downregulated HGF synthesis and secretion by inhibiting MAPK / ERK signaling, thus impairing the protective effect of BM-MSCs on BLM induced AEC injury.
evidence: NMDA receptor activation downregulated HGF synthesis and secretion by inhibiting MAPK/ERK signaling, thus impairing the protective effect of BM-MSCs on BLM-induced AEC injury
